title: configuration flexibility
extract: Flexibility is used as an attribute of various types of systems. ... In the context of engineering design one can define flexibility as the ability of a system to respond to potential internal or external changes affecting its value delivery, in a timely and cost-effective manner.
extract_html: Flexibility is used as an attribute of various types of systems. ... In the context of engineering design one can define flexibility as the ability of a system to respond to potential internal or external changes affecting its value delivery, in a timely and cost-effective manner.
